entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies not respected in 8.0.100-rc.1.23463.5 #35817
  • Net 8.0 RC During build System.Text.Json NuGet isn't copied to bin folder (in net 7.0 its still copied) #35816

Closed

  • /ignoreprojectextensions:.dcproj not working #18259
  • Is it safe to delete older .NET runtimes? #18248
  • Project references with ReferenceOutputAssembly=false still get runtimeconfig and deps.json files from referenced projects #18207
  • Container tooling creates many HTTP connections #35753
  • SDK reports a number of new errors when multi-targeting and enabling AOT/Trim analyzers #35528
  • SDK shouldn't upload manifest separately when uploading tags. #35431
  • Container publish changes in DN8.P6 not adequately documented in release notes #34272
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET8 RC2 installed, Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\dotnet\templates\8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23476.41.nupkg(/content/BlazorWeb-CSharp/.template.config/localize/templatestrings.cs.json)".. displays during creating project. #35768

PullRequests

Created

  • Including RuntimePackAsset in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroup #35835
    untriaged
  • Import Publish SDK from base .NET SDK #35834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.403 #35833
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.310 #35832
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.113 #35831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.416 #35830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.319 #35829
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.124 #35828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35821
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Containers: reuse HTTP connections more. #35754
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • ComputeDotnetBaseImageTag: handle rtm and servicing channels. #35775
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.0
  • Detect correctly multitargeted apps for trim/AOT/single-file warnings #35767
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Add dotnet package search command #35742
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow Worker SDK projects to invoke Publish Profile-derived targets #35794
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Update 8.0.2xx for loc #35761
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • APICompat - Use compatible assembly references #35489
    Area-ApiCompat, 9.0.1xx
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Adjust trim/aot warning messages (#35186) #35595
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • SDK resolver perf: Optimize EnvironmentProvider.SearchPaths #35807
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make CheckForDuplicateItems case insensitive #35697
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • SDK resolver perf: Don't check current process for dotnet.exe on .NET Framework #35805
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
